targets.query: SELECT "Value" FROM "ConsumerLag" WHERE ("typeName" != 'type=FetcherLagMetrics,name=ConsumerLag,clientId=ReplicaFetcherThread-0-10,topic=__consumer_offsets,partition=1' OR "typeName" != 'type=FetcherLagMetrics,name=ConsumerLag,clientId=ReplicaFetcherThread-0-10,topic=__consumer_offsets,partition=10' OR "typeName" != 'type=FetcherLagMetrics,name=ConsumerLag,clientId=ReplicaFetcherThread-0-10,topic=__consumer_offsets,partition=11') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "typeName"
